info.author: Karl Lindekugel
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Provides a manager framework that allows the easy use and display of curses menus.

Example usage in test case accepts either another menu to display or a function
to call.
info.name: PyMenu
info.summary: Utility for displaying and easily using menus
info.html_description:
Provides a manager framework that allows the easy use and display of curses menus.

Example usage in test case accepts either another menu to display or a function to call.
